item.title: T-Mobile 与 Starlink 开始大规模卫星连接测试
item.description: T-Mobile周日表示，该公司已开始大规模测试由SpaceX的Starlink提供的卫星对手机服务，这家美国无线运营商的目标是消除移动死角，并将连接扩展到偏远地区。【原文：T-Mobile said on Sunday it has started wide-scale testing of its satellite-to-cell service, powered by SpaceX's Starlink, as the U.S. wireless carrier aims to eliminate mobile dead zones and extend connectivity to remote areas.】

item.title: 中国大陆蚕食份额，台湾传统芯片业思考未来
item.description: 2015 年，台湾力晶科技公司与中国东部城市合肥达成协议，建立新的芯片代工厂，希望此举有助于更好地进入前景广阔的中国市场。【原文：When Taiwan's Powerchip Technology entered a deal with the eastern Chinese city of Hefei in 2015 to set up a new chip foundry, it hoped the move would help provide better access the promising Chinese market.】

item.title: 新日铁拒绝就特朗普反对持有美国钢铁多数股权的声明发表评论
item.description: 日本新日铁公司周一拒绝就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于任何人不得拥有美国钢铁公司多数股权的声明发表评论。【原文：Japan's Nippon Steel on Monday declined to comment on U.S. President Donald Trump's statement that no one can have a majority stake in U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 华尔街期货下滑，美元因关税威胁而攀升
item.description: 周一，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次警告即将对包括钢铁和铝在内的产品征收关税，这一通胀举措可能会限制降息的空间，随后华尔街股票期货下跌，美元广泛上涨。【原文：Wall Street share futures fell and the dollar rose broadly on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump repeated warnings of imminent tariffs including on steel and aluminium, an inflationary move that could limit the scope for rate cuts.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第四季度净利润同比增长 10%，符合预期
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团周一向证券交易所提交的文件显示，由于商业账目和市场交易双双增长，该集团第四季度的净利润比去年同期增长了10%。【原文：DBS Group , Singapore's biggest bank, posted a 10% rise in net profit in the fourth quarter from a year earlier on the back of growth in both commercial book and markets trading, according to stock exchange filing on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国的债务可能比想象的要少
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，美国的债务可能比想象的要少，并称这可能是因为与债务支付有关的欺诈行为。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said the United States may carry less debt than thought and said it could be because of fraud related to debt payments.】

item.title: 早间竞价驾驭美国利率和全球关税紧张局势
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将于周一宣布征收 25% 的钢铝关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，他将于周一宣布对所有进口到美国的钢铁和铝征收25%的关税，这是他贸易政策改革的又一次重大升级。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday that he will announce on Monday 25% tariffs on all steel and aluminum imports into the U.S., another major escalation in his trade policy overhaul.】

item.title: 马克龙表示私营部门将向法国人工智能领域投资 1,090 亿欧元
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙说，在周一开幕的巴黎人工智能峰会上，法国将宣布私营部门在人工智能领域的投资总额约为1090亿欧元（合1125亿美元）。【原文：France will announce private sector investments totalling some 109 billion euros ($112.5 billion) in its artificial intelligence sector during the Paris AI summit which opens on Monday, President Emmanuel Macron said.】

item.title: 全球停电后，索尼将为 PlayStation Plus 用户提供五天延期服务
item.description: 索尼公司周日表示，在上周五和周六PlayStation Network（PSN）全球中断约18小时后，所有PlayStation Plus会员将自动获得额外五天的服务。【原文：Sony said on Sunday that all PlayStation Plus members would automatically receive an additional five days of service, after a global outage disrupted the PlayStation Network (PSN) for about 18 hours on Friday and Saturday.】

item.title: 在 DeepSeek 的热潮中，中国公司详细介绍了人工智能的使用情况
item.description: 中国汽车制造商长城汽车和中国领先的电信供应商正在将 DeepSeek 发布的人工智能模型整合到他们的产品中，这些中国公司都希望利用这家初创公司的突破和关注度。【原文：Chinese automaker Great Wall Motor and China's leading telecoms providers are integrating the AI model released by DeepSeek into their offerings, the latest Chinese companies looking to capitalize on the start-up's breakthrough and attention.】

item.title: 心境、怀旧和人工智能：超级碗广告商挖掘美国的过去和未来
item.description: 今年的比赛中，广告商们又回到了安全、怀旧的赛场--大量的克莱德驯鹿，却看不到一个有影响力的变性人，这体现了广告商们的趋势：倚重名人、幽默和美国人的真性情。【原文：The return to the safe, nostalgic ground of Clydesdales in abundance and nary a transgender influencer in sight embodies the trend for advertisers at this year's game: lean on celebrities, humor and American true grit.】

item.title: 热潮过后，中国将削减清洁电力补贴
item.description: 中国最高经济规划机构周日表示，在太阳能和风能发电装机蓬勃发展之后，中国正在采取措施减少对可再生能源项目的补贴。【原文：China's top economic planning agency said on Sunday it was taking steps to scale back subsidies for renewable energy projects after a boom in solar and wind power installations.】

item.title: 焕然一新的中东开始吸引投资者......然后特朗普来了
item.description: 中东地区的历史性动荡开始吸引国际投资者的目光，在经历了如此多的动荡之后，他们对相对和平和经济复苏的前景充满热情。【原文：A historic shake-up of the Middle East is starting to draw international investors, warming to the prospects of relative peace and economic recovery after so much turmoil.】

item.title: 新西兰将放宽签证规定吸引外国投资者
item.description: 新西兰中右翼政府周日表示，为刺激经济增长，新西兰将放宽签证规定以吸引更多外国投资者。【原文：New Zealand will relax visa rules to attract more foreign investors, in efforts to stimulate economic growth, its centre-right government said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国 1 月份消费通胀加快，生产通缩持续
item.description: 1 月份，中国居民消费价格指数创下 5 个月来最快增速，而生产者价格通缩仍在持续，因为在政府推出各种激励措施后，假日消费令人鼓舞。【原文：China's consumer price index grew at the fastest pace in five months in January, while producer price deflation persisted, as holiday spending looked encouraging in the wake of various government incentives.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克称无意收购 TikTok
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他对收购 TikTok 没有兴趣。TikTok 是一款广受欢迎的短视频应用程序，美国出于国家安全考虑一直试图禁止其中国所有者字节跳动（ByteDance）使用该应用程序。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said that he was not interested in purchasing TikTok, the popular short-video app that the United States has been trying to ban over national security concerns with its Chinese owner ByteDance.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，激进分子埃利奥特持有英国石油公司大量股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六援引消息人士的话报道，激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已持有石油巨头英国石油公司（BP）的大量股份。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has built a significant stake in oil major BP, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing sources.】

item.title: 波音公司警告登月火箭项目员工裁员
item.description: 波音公司周六警告将在其太空发射系统登月火箭项目中进行裁员，称根据美国国家航空航天局（NASA）阿特米斯（Artemis）项目的修订和成本预期，预计将减少约400个职位。【原文：Boeing warned on Saturday of layoffs in its Space Launch System moon rocket program, saying it expects to have about 400 fewer positions in line with revisions to NASA's Artemis program and cost expectations.】

item.title: TikTok 将在其网站上为美国 Android 用户提供下载应用程序的套餐工具包
item.description: 社交媒体应用 TikTok 周五表示，将在其网站上提供安卓软件包，以便美国安卓用户下载该应用并在上面进行连接。【原文：Social media app TikTok said on Friday it was making Android package kits available on its website so that U.S. Android users can download the app and connect on it.】

item.title: 石破表示，日美同意由财务主管负责外汇事务
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，他同意美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的意见，即两国将把外汇汇率问题交由两国财长处理。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said he agreed with U.S. President Donald Trump that the two countries will leave foreign exchange-rate matters in the hands of their finance ministers.】

item.title: 赌场大亨永利要求美国最高法院重审《泰晤士报》诉沙利文案的诽谤规则
item.description: 赌场大亨史蒂夫-永利（Steve Wynn）要求美国最高法院审理一项上诉，如果上诉获得批准，最高法院将有机会重新审视 1964 年一项具有里程碑意义的裁决中规定的对记者的诽谤保护。【原文：Casino mogul Steve Wynn has asked the U.S. Supreme Court to hear an appeal that, if granted, could give the justices a chance to revisit libel protections for journalists enshrined in a landmark 1964 ruling that has been questioned by two conservative justices and President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Anduril 正在洽谈新一轮融资，估值可能达到 280 亿美元
item.description: 消息人士周五透露，Anduril Industries 正在洽谈新一轮融资，可能会将这家由 Palmer Luckey 创办的国防科技初创公司的估值提高到 280 亿美元。【原文：Anduril Industries is in talks for a new funding round that could raise the valuation of the Palmer Luckey-founded defense technology startup to $28 billion, sources said on Friday.】

item.title: 马斯克团队进军美国消费者金融监管机构，特朗普为亿万富翁辩护
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政府效率部（DOGE）成员周五进驻了消费者金融保护局，特斯拉首席执行官的团队将其影响力扩展到了整个美国政府。【原文：Members of Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) moved into the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Friday, according to two people familiar with the move, as the Tesla CEO's team extended its influence across the U.S. government.】

item.title: 消息人士称，马斯克在摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙出席的活动上发表演讲
item.description: 据熟知内情的消息人士透露，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克周四在摩根大通的一次会议上发表了讲话，该行首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）也出席了这次会议。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk spoke at a JPMorgan Chase conference on Thursday which was attended by the bank's chief Jamie Dimon, according to source familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美国财政部任命胡德为代理货币监理专员
item.description: 美国财政部货币监理署周五发表声明称，已任命罗德尼-胡德（Rodney Hood）从 2 月 10 日起担任代理货币监理专员。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department has appointed Rodney Hood to serve as the acting comptroller of the currency from February 10, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: Meta 准备周一裁员 - 内部备忘录
item.description: 路透社周五看到的一份内部备忘录显示，Facebook 的所有者 Meta Platforms 计划下周在全公司范围内进行预期的裁员，同时加快招聘机器学习工程师。【原文：Facebook owner Meta Platforms plans to carry out its expected company-wide layoffs next week while pushing ahead with the expedited hiring of machine learning engineers, it told staffers in internal memos seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 独家新闻消息人士称，特朗普空军提名人以有利于马斯克的 SpaceX 公司的方式安排卫星合同
item.description: 据七位熟悉合同的人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统提名的空军部长人选，目前是国家间谍卫星机构的一名高级官员，以有利于埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司的方式安排了一份数十亿美元的合同招标。【原文：President Donald Trump's nominee as Air Force Secretary, currently a top official at the national spy satellite agency, arranged a multibillion-dollar contract solicitation in a way that favored Elon Musk's SpaceX, according to seven people familiar with the contract.】

item.title: 消息人士称新日铁并未放弃对美国钢铁公司的竞购
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普早些时候表示，日本钢铁制造商将 "投资 "美国钢铁公司，但不会收购美国钢铁公司，但两位接近该交易的人士周五表示，新日铁并未撤回其 149 亿美元的收购美国钢铁公司的出价。【原文：Nippon steel has not withdrawn its $14.9 billion bid to buy U.S. Steel , two people close to the deal said on Friday, after President Donald Trump said earlier the Japanese steelmaker would "invest" in US Steel but not buy it.】

item.title: 美国银行首席执行官莫伊尼汉的薪酬在 2024 年增至 3500 万美元
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）在周五提交的一份文件中称，该公司将首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）2024 年的薪酬提高了约 21%，达到 3500 万美元。【原文：Bank of America Corp increased the compensation for Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan by roughly 21% to $35 million for 2024, the lender said in a filing on Friday.】
